notesStmt.note: Verse no2 used by Peterborough for respond c7650

rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Ely Wor Cht Pet Evm Cdm Bat Mch

res.rBody:
Erit mihi dominus in deum
et lapis iste et lapi iste quem erexi in titulum vocabitur domus dei
et de universis quae dederis mihi et de universis quae dederit mihi decimas et hostias pacificas offeram tibi

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F Hyd Ely Cht Pet Evm Mch

verses.vBody: Si dominus deus meus fuerit mecum in via ista qua ego ambulo et custodierit me

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-S CAO-L Wor Cdm Bat

verses.vBody:
Si reversus fuero prospere
ad domum in domum
patris mei patris mei de omnibus quae dederit mihi

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd Ely Wor Cht Pet Evm Cdm Bat Mch
